songs.title: My Christmas

description.plain: This is a story of the Christmas of Marcus Hopson, otherwise know as Hopsin, and how they tend to all be very.. sub par. It’s a song telling of his jealousy of his rich-ass friend and how Hopsin’s parents get him socks instead of that Barbie doll he really wanted for his 10th birthday.

songs.embed_content: Read “My Christmas” by Hopsin on Genius

body.plain: This is a story of the Christmas of Marcus Hopson, otherwise know as Hopsin, and how they tend to all be very.. sub par. It’s a song telling of his jealousy of his rich-ass friend and how Hopsin’s parents get him socks instead of that Barbie doll he really wanted for his 10th birthday.

songs.lyrics:
My Christmas Lyrics[Skit: Hopsin & Friend]
Ayo Pillowman
Wassup man?
It's almost Christmas bro, aren't you excited?
Man, hell no
Huh? Why not?
Man, it's a long story, man
Dude, what's going on?

[Chorus: Hopsin (Friend)]
Hey Mom, Dad
What did you get me for
Christmas?
(You gotta feel the spirit bro, come on)
Hey Mom (Sing it), Dad (Yeah)
What did you get me for
Christmas?
Lemme tell you what Christmas is like for me, man
Check this shit out (What's going on, man?)
[Verse: Hopsin (Friend)]
Yo, this year, I'm really not looking forward to Christmas (Why?)
I'ma wake up really happy, then get pissed 'cause I ain't get shit (Aw)
Momma be in the kitchen, cooking burnt ass biscuits (Ew)
When I look at 'em funny, her ass gon' be like "What is it?" (Ha)
My friend gon' call me up telling me bullshit that I can't believe
Like "Yo bro, guess what? My mom got me Mercedes keys" (Woah)
And I'ma lie and be like "Yeah, that shit is great ya see
But to be honest, Christmas is just another day to me" (I see)
I'ma be mad 'cause his parents rich and my parents not (So?)
He gets cars, I get pairs of socks
I'm always gettin' treated unfair a lot, this Christmas, I ain't havin' fun
Our tree ain't even real, it's a detachable plastic one (No way)
My dad gon' come with his cheap watch that he got me
From the swap meet, and if I ask him if it's real, he'll say "Probably" (Oh)
Man Dad, do you have no heart? You couldn't get me a go kart
Or a Tyco RC remote control car? (Chillax)
He gon' be like "There you go makin' this noise
I done told yo ass you too old to playin' with toys"
Then my mom gon' walk in the room and start arguin' too
My dad gon' be like "Go woman, nobody talkin' to you" (Wow)
And I'ma say "Dad you love talking mad shit
But in public you always act like you above causing havoc? (No way)
Then I'ma run upstairs, mad as fuck 'cause I've had it
Probably masturbate while watching Spongebob and Patrick (Ew)
I don't know
You might also like[Chorus: Hopsin]
Hey Mom, Dad
What did you get me for
Christmas?
Hey Mom, Dad
I said what did you get me for
Christmas?

[Outro: Hopsin]
Fuck man, stupid ass Christmas, man
That shit used to be fun when I was little
Now that shit is wack as fuck, man
Turned into a grown ass man now
Stupid ass real life shit, man, Damn!2Embed

description.plain: This is an unreleased song from Hopsin about a girl that he really likes. This could be talking about the girl that he later talked about on the song “Gimmie that Money” from his album “Knock Madness”.

body.plain: This is an unreleased song from Hopsin about a girl that he really likes. This could be talking about the girl that he later talked about on the song “Gimmie that Money” from his album “Knock Madness”.

songs.lyrics:
Be My Girl Lyrics[Intro]
Alright let see if I can pull this off
Girl I just wanna be wit' you I hope you never leave
Nah I didn't like that man
Throw more doubles in there
(Oh girl I really need you)
Maybe instead with the doubles throw like seventy of them in there
Your the girl I be dreaming of
Alright that's cool
Let me start the rush right now
[Verse 1]
It's like you turn me to a better man
The times that we spend together, sometimes I just wish they'd never end
You make me want to settle in
Shit, I be thankful keeping our relationship with each other as just a friend
I'm complete now that you came along
You made me whole, your spectacular beauty is 'bout as great as gold
This ain't a joke, you'll never know what you do to me
And I'ma always be happy just as long as you cool with me
Forget those women that I used to like
I'm wanting you up in my life so baby let's make it you and I

I wanna be the man that's taking you out
It don't seem like it, but you the woman I be thinking about

I be dreaming of, so be my girl

That's the type of stuff I think about, but I keep it inside

And I ain't even got a problem wit' it, that's fine
But I just want you to know, that I don't want you to go
And if you leave, I want you even more
But I'll probably be hurt worse, I feel like my life has hit the dirt
But that's just the way that the earth works

songs.title: Simon Says (Freestyle)

description.plain: On December 26th, while on holiday, Hopsin released a freestyle over the famous “Simon Says” beat in which he rapped about his success, haters, other rappers in the game and gave a reference to one of his songs and mentioned rapper Logic.

songs.embed_content: Read “Simon Says (Freestyle)” by Hopsin on Genius

body.plain: On December 26th, while on holiday, Hopsin released a freestyle over the famous “Simon Says” beat in which he rapped about his success, haters, other rappers in the game and gave a reference to one of his songs and mentioned rapper Logic.

songs.lyrics:
Simon Says (Freestyle) Lyrics[Verse]
Yeah, niggas better lay low, I swear this ain't no game bro
Asking for blessings won't prevent you from being preyed on
See I ain't underground or commercial, I'm in the grey zone
I had bars back when Verizon was making payphones
Niggas say that Hop fell off, I'm yelling "How, stupid?"
Y'all ain't never eating but verbally making bowel movements
Better bow, you in the presence of wild 'coon shit
Fuck y'all, you gave me the mic knowing I'll lose it
My style's too sick, boy I've been programmed with pro raps
All these niggas' tinder as fuck but still no match
I'm a nice guy but when I'm in front of the notepad
Let's fuck it, dawg, off with his head, shit it'll grow back
How you claim to be ill when your career ain't never seen a sequel
Niggas ain't playing you in they Beats Pill
I could touch lives through the speaker, 3D skills
Stop it boy, I'm on a roll like TV film
I remember niggas didn't fuck with me, dawg
The tables turned, now we're even, damn, what are the odds?
There must be a God, you fuck with the ugliest broads
Your hands out, it better be for a lovely applause
Otherwise do not bother
Undercover Prodigy, how could I not prosper?
I am the godfather, style's beyond proper
Fuck you little lame ass wannabe Hop bloggers mooching off Hop's dollars
You niggas ain't shit, you wish you were shot callers
So y'all can get fucked like I do at massage parlors
I'm in and out the Matrix, shit I utilize both
The Grim reaper, you and I know
Will you survive? No
Once these wack MCs find out I crucify souls
They'll be calling the number on Logic's suicide songYou might also likeEmbed

songs.lyrics:
West Coast Eclipse Lyrics[Verse 1]
When I rap, I like to seem wack at first
And rhyme cheap words, like curse and verse
And once it passes like one or two bars
I turn the switch on and start crushing fools hard
Who said the west isn't consistent, I'm fixing to fix it
For all these niggas who listening and living imprisoned
I'm thinkin' it isn't missing it's villain, killing them image
Now I'mma rip this, now witness it as I finish the sentence
Losing hip-hop was a tragic loss but I found it and glued it right
To my dick so if you want it you'll have to jack it off
Rappers acting soft as a fabric cloth, I'mma smash 'em all
Their nuts are like berries, mines are the size of basketballs
I choke MCs out with a strong vice grip
Then beat them with the sticks from the cross that they hung Christ with
Head to the club then pull me a sprung white chick
You all know how Hop gets down, he one nights it
I sleep walk at night with a bunch of madness
Mob through the halls and talk with a Russian accent
Ready to kill like I'm a real thug assassin
Who beat my dad's ass and wake up like nothing happened
I'm ruthless, and I do drop bombs
I got fools in the valley like, "Dude, nuh-uh!"
When my album drops make sure that you cop one
We need a raw fool like me since 2Pac's gone
Wack rappers like, "Hop, I'll disable you in the booth!"
I'm like, "For real? That's a fatal attempt to do!"
You thinking you spit the truth, I shake you and strip your jewels
Then hang you up from a roof, and strangle you with a noose
Cremate you with four torches, flame of the torch scorching
Leaving your corpse tortured of course it's hardcore shit
And if there's ever a day that my pockets hurting
I'm robbing you, with a Osama Bin Laden turban
Hip-Hop is urging for a new flock of verses to rock the circuit
All you flops emerging are pitiful, we did not deserve it
Your style ain't even worth the fame
It's watered down more than New Orleans during a hurricane
Your whole album was a verbal shame
I'm Hopsin, don't act like you ain't heard the nameYou might also like3Embed

When I got the call to come up to Tim's, I couldn't wait to

'Cause I own up to any truth you try to use against me
Since high school I've been known to be an abusive MC
I never stop the madness until I see you surrender

Here's your one way ticket to Hell in first class
Y'all all be making my nerves spaz, my word craft will make you disperse cash
I'm the special ed nigga you ignored, y'all the motherfuckers that I do it for
When I step inside the booth I'm lighting everything on fire like I was the Human Torch
Whooping ass, kicking through the door, spewing gore, breaking windows of your new Accord
Anyone who ever left better not be coming back to try to build a new rapport
I'm wild rude, a foul dude, I prowl through
I step on the mic and all the sudden my bowels move
Catching bodies? I'm 'bout to
I'm the one you should bow to, you niggas is ass, trash, cow poo
Style's based off pure vengeance, I'm a fierce engine
You'll get rear-ended, there's weird tension, my peers sense it

Happy Valentine’s Day Alyce Lyrics[Verse]
Yo
There's something that everyone needs to know about
There's a special girl her name is Alyce and yes we go out
I can't be with her at the moment cuz I'm doing shows now
So I had to do this shit the only way I know how
You set my heart right again I swear I'm always smilin'
If you ever down I'll hold you up like you were violin
Groupies reaching for my love but no I don't invite em' in
My heart is in your hands and that's the only place I like it in
I do believe you're meant for me
I swear to God this shit's a dream
The saying goes when you find the one you'll know it instantly
Way back in 2010 I've been known
But I was having trouble tryna get up out that friend zone
But it's O-kay cuz every treasure's worth waiting for
I thank the lord that I have you cuz I was filled with so much hate before
Shit I've been cheesing hard every single day on tour
I gotta stop that shit though, for real my face is sore
For real Alyce, it's like you changed me to a new guy
I never felt the urge by a woman so much to do right
We gonna travel the planet through the Bahamas to Dubai
Any preference you like, we're gonna be in the moonlight
Living like death is foreign
Haters we'll just ignore em'
They get salty because we found happiness way before 'em
Baby we hotter than a whistling tea pot
And we don't need no outsiders telling us what we got, peace out
Girl you're so beautiful you're looking like a goddess
But still you always humble and stay modest
You ain't digging in my pockets
You got your own money up inside your wallet
Girl you so fucking bad you need stop it, I just
Feel like I need to fly away with you baby
No other girl can ever take what you gave me
Will you be my Valentine? Baby let me know
We go together perfectly, the Cancer and the Leo, yeah!
I ride for you like a soldier
Baby all you gotta do is give me your love, yeah
The world can get to know us, show love
If you'll be my valentine
[Outro]
Happy Valentine's day Alyce. I hope you like this. Sorry I can't be there, I'm on my tour but, just letting you know that I'm thinking about you, and I want the world to know as well. PeaceYou might also like5Embed

songs.title: Tracey’s Stalker

description.plain:
Hopsin plays the role of an obsessive stalker cannot get over his love, Tracey. It doesn’t necessarily end up the way he planned.

The track is from an unreleased tape, “Emerge.”

songs.title: Mr. Pillowman

description.plain: In this song, Hopsin gives us a perspective on what he has had to deal with being in the music industry, and how he was constantly slept on

songs.embed_content: Read “Mr. Pillowman” by Hopsin on Genius

body.plain: In this song, Hopsin gives us a perspective on what he has had to deal with being in the music industry, and how he was constantly slept on

songs.lyrics:
Mr. Pillowman Lyrics[Chorus]
Mr Pillowman, you can sleep on me. And i'll fulfill your dreams
I'm the
Pillowman, you probably heard about me. I'm more than what I seem

[Verse 1]
Once upon a time there was a boy named Mr. Pillowman
He had enough rage bottled inside to even kill a man
And always went out of his way just so that he could get a friend
He'd ask for opportunities but nobody would give a damn
And he would always hope he made it, cause he was so creative
But he was slowly hated going through these dopey mazes
He'd never hesitate whenever a test was given
He'd pass it with an A+ but get no recognition
At 19 years old he thought he caught his break
And understood that patience and motivation is all it takes
His mother was so happy for him that she bought a cake
I wish you could have seen the smile on his father's face
Two days after that, he was feeling lost and dazed
The man who was suppose to be his hookup was talking fake
Now this is oftly strange, his world is cloudy as it softly rains
As he's crying out loud, his heart would sing...
[Chorus]
Mr Pillowman, you can sleep on me. And i'll fulfill your dreams
I'm the
Pillowman, you probably heard about me. I'm more than what I seem

[Verse 2]
Mr Pillowman. Nothing but a civil man
Always felt that his success was just around the riverbend
He'd smile in your face but down in his heart he'd be sad
The world would never acknowledge half of the talents he had
22 years old he thought he caught his break again
Because his buddy hooked him up, and it's for surely thanks to him
That Mr. Pilloman, is happy and so proud of his life
Wow this is nice, it's like he felt the power of Christ
He knew that God is good and God is bold, It's time to Rock and Roll
Somebody finally understood he was a pot of gold
His lack of success was to the point where it's gotten old
But patience was the key, so the stories often told
...Then his buddy called, and said "I hate to tell you
But that connection that I hooked you up with never fell through"
Then Pillowman's like "What the hell dude? You said this was a swell move
I'm probably better off trying to sell shoes"

[Chorus]
Mr Pillowman, you can sleep on me. And i'll fulfill your dreams
I'm the
Pillowman, you probably heard about me. I'm more than what I seem
You might also like[Verse 3]
Here's a secret. I am Mr. Pillowman
Going on 25 and I'm wishing I could live again
I've reached out to people but yet nobody would lend a hand
I feel like i'll never be able to pay my rent again
I'm getting old and time is crucial, feels like I'm not as useful
My only meals consist of Kool-aid, and Ramen noodles
...I wish I had more, but my mom and dad's poor
So when you see me don't bother to ask me what I'm mad for
..Yeah you can laugh about it. But I'm just sad and pouting
Seeing motherfuckers make it who don't have no talent
That's 10 years of my life that's down the drain
I feel like a true failure living life without a brain
But yo, I'm still trying to get a name
Rapping on the mic and spitting flames maybe i could get some change
But I'm at the point I'm about to say "fuck it"
Cause I released a nationwide album and I never made a buck from it

[Chorus]
Mr Pillowman, you can sleep on me. And i'll fulfill your dreams
I'm the
Pillowman, you probably heard about me. I'm more than what I seem2Embed

songs.title: AOL Shut Down

description.plain:
Back in the days of Aol chat rooms, rappers would share their music with one another. According to Hopsin he was in a chat room with some other MC’s named language arts, Wicky Rosco, Chops,
and Perez were getting in arguments with Hop and
diss tracks were made. Unfortunately I can only find the ones Hopsin recorded. He disses rapper Language Arts in a second track as well.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iBeNSHj1HZA

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lLK24bVyLeA

songs.title: Trust Me

description.plain:
As of now this song is not officially released, Hopsin gave Manny Santiago (a friend of his) the song to use in video, so far its only appearance has been in a skateboarding video winch is why there are all the slapping sounds in the background. It can be assumed that this track will be officially released sometime in 2015 when Hopsin’s album “Pound Syndrome” Drops.

This song is one of the very rare moments where Hopsin raps over a beat produced by someone other than himself, in this case Scoop DeVille.

songs.title_with_featured: Hopsin - Ill Mind Of Hopsin 5 - (Em Português)

description.plain:
Umas das melhores músicas do Hopsin.
Neste som ele fala sobre tudo que destrói a sociedade e a juventude de hoje em dia.
Fala sobre drogas, prostituição e sobre delinquência.
Decidi “traduzir” ela toda, por seu grande conteúdo reflexivo. Ela não está 100% traduzida da forma direta, eu a traduzi meio que já colocando o significado da frase junto com a tradução, pra que ficasse mais fácil de entender.

songs.title: Upside Down

description.plain: “Upside Down” is an unreleased Hopsin track that was intended to be a one-off single to promote his 2009 debut album Gazing at the Moonlight. Reportedly, Tanner Guinn, Hopsin’s manager at the time, advised him not to release it. The song was then shelved and never released.
